EmailTemplate.name: Occupier Strategy Seminars
EmailTemplate.subject: Invite: Cutting, Highlighting or Growing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
AECOM's Occupier Strategy Strategy team, in association with Nabarro LLP, invites you to a series of seminars focusing on Corporate Real Estate Strategy
AECOM and Nabarro LLP invite you to attend a series of round table breakfast discussions on key issues affecting your real estate portfolio.
Click propertystyling.europe@aecom.com and let us know which of the discussions you will be attending. Please feel free to attend some or all of the breakfast discussions.
A swift response would be appreciated as places are limited.
Breakfast discussions:
Tuesday 17 September 2013 CUTTING: Issues for consolidation - Workplace rationalisation - Impact of Good Harvest and House of Fraser: limitations on lease disposal - Surplus disposal options
Tuesday 8 October 2013 HIGHLIGHTING: Enhancing current performance - Sustainability and energy - Energy Act 2011: Prohibition on low EPC disposal - FM delivery options
Tuesday 5 November 2013 GROWING: Issues for expansion - Market trends and forecast - Redevelopment: Community Infrastructure Levy - Office of the Future
Breakfast discussions
VENUE Nabarro, Lacon House, 84 Theobaldâ€™s Road, London WC1X 8RW
TIME 8am registration for 8.15am start, to 9.30am
HOW TO REGISTER Please RSVP to propertystyling.europe@aecom.com and let us know which of the discussions you will be attending. Please feel free to attend some or all of the breakfast discussions.
If unable to attend please feel free to forward to another member of your team.
If you have any queries please contact either;
Edward Saunders E:Edward.saunders@aecom.com T: 07775 786 560
David McDougall E:david.mcdougall@aecom.com T:07833 435 991
